channel.title: --Call Of Duty Modern Warfare 2 Classes--
channel.description:
[size=24pt]__Call Of Duty Modern Warfare 2__[/size]
Hey.. On this topic you can post your most used class or all your favorite classes...
Write the class as this=
Name Of Class:: ___________ ----------------------- Primary: ___________ Secondary: ___________ Equipment: ___________ Special Granade: ___________ ----------------------- Perk 1: ___________ Perk 2: ___________ Perk 3: ___________ Death Streak: ___________ ----------------------- Level: ___________
My most used class is=
Name Of Class:: Assault ----------------------- Primary: M16A4 w/ ACOG Scope Secondary: Ranger / Akimbo Equipment: Claymore Special Granade: Flashbang ----------------------- Perk 1: Scavenger /Pro/ Perk 2: Stopping Power /Pro/ Perk 3: Steady Aim /Pro/ [ Dont say that it isnt smart when i dont got sniper ] Death Streak: Final Stand ----------------------- Level: 49
BTW= If someone knows the best sniper class please write it....

item.title: --Call Of Duty Modern Warfare 2 Classes--
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

Name Of Class:: ghullie ninja_

Primary: barrett heartbeat__
Secondary: usp .45 tactile
Equipment: throwin knife______
Special Granade: stunz_______

Perk 1: _marathon pro
Perk 2: lightweight pro
Perk 3: commando pro
Death Streak: class steal thingy

Level:59

I don’t actually snipe with this class (unless perfect headshot)
I just use the scope and heartbeat sensor to observe map while speeding around

item.description:
@pkerA wrote:

m.dog311:

There’s 6 Modern Warfares???/////// When the fuck did this happen???

U didnt know? lol… modern warfare 1 is the fourth game… and world at war is the fifth game…

The first, second and third name is just called call of duty 1,2,3
